attributes.action: Make it Law, that mobile phone companies inform contract customers of their balance.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I propose, that The Prime Minister makes it a legal requirement for all Mobile Phone Companies to advise their Contract Customers, when they have gone over their monthly allowance. In doing so, the phone companies would be responsible for sending the customer a text message, informing them that they had gone over their allowance by £10, and every £10 thereafter, thus advising them of the accumulative figure.
